languages.text: "От перечисления моих свершений можно утомиться". {n}Воин хвастливо указывают на отметину на броне в форме скрещенных костей.{/n} "Сей знак стойкости я заслужил, сразив царя-вожака убогого эльдарского племени. Он нанес мне тяжкую рану, и волчий жрец сказал, что мне не выжить... но я всегда выживаю. Два года лежал я в беспамятстве после той битвы".

"A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew a chieftain of an Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."
languages.original_text: "От перечисления моих свершений можно утомиться". {n}Воин хвастливо указывают на отметину на броне в форме скрещенных костей.{/n} "Сей знак стойкости я заслужил, сразив царя-вожака убогого эльдарского племени. Он нанес мне тяжкую рану, и волчий жрец сказал, что мне не выжить... но я всегда выживаю. Два года лежал я в беспамятстве после той битвы".

traits.locale_text: "A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew the chieftain of a pathetic Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

"A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew the chieftain of a pathetic Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

"A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew the chieftain of a pathetic Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

"A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew the chieftain of an Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

languages.text: “如果把我所有的事迹都说上一遍，那恐怕会像雪崩一样把你埋起来。”{n}乌尔法自豪地指着盔甲上两根白骨交叉的图案。{/n}“这个印记象征坚韧不屈，是我干掉某个艾达灵族的酋长之后赢来的。我在那场战斗中受了重伤，野狼祭司说我必死无疑……可我还是挺了下来。战斗结束之后，我神志不清地躺了两年。”
languages.original_text: "A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew a chieftain of an Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

traits.locale_text: “如果把我所有的事迹都说上一遍，那恐怕会像雪崩一样把你埋起来。”{n}乌尔法自豪地指着盔甲上两根白骨交叉的图案。{/n}“这个印记象征坚韧不屈，是我干掉某个该死的艾达灵族的酋长之后赢来的。我在那场战斗中受了重伤，野狼祭司说我必死无疑……可我还是挺了下来。战斗结束之后，我神志不清地躺了两年。”

languages.text: «Una narración completa de mis hazañas le sentaría como una avalancha». {n}Ulfar señala una marca de dos tibias cruzadas en su armadura.{/n} «Me gané esta marca de resistencia al matar a un cacique de una tribu Aeldari. Me infligió una herida grave y el Sacerdote Lobo dijo que no sobreviviría... pero aquí sigo. Pasé dos años delirando tras la batalla».
languages.original_text: "A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew a chieftain of an Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

traits.locale_text: «Una narración completa de mis hazañas le sentaría como una avalancha». {n}Ulfar señala una marca de dos tibias cruzadas en su armadura.{/n} «Me gané esta marca de resistencia al matar a un cacique de una tribu Aeldari. Me infligió una herida grave y el Sacerdote Lobo dijo que no sobreviviría... pero aquí sigo. Pasé dos años delirando tras la batalla».

languages.text: 「俺の行いをすべて洗い出せば、雪崩のようにお前に降りかかるだろう」{n}ウルファーは誇らしげに、鎧に刻まれた十字の骨を示す。{/n}「アエルダリの族長を倒したとき、俺はこの忍耐の印を得た。ヤツは俺に大怪我を負わせ、牙狼法師は俺が生き残るのは無理だと言った…だが、俺はまだ死んではいない。あの戦いの後、2年間錯乱状態にあったがな」
languages.original_text: "A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew a chieftain of an Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の行いをすべて洗い出せば、雪崩のようにお前に降りかかるだろう」{n}ウルファーは誇らしげに、鎧に刻まれた十字の骨を示す。{/n}「哀れなアエルダリの族長を倒したとき、俺はこの忍耐の印を得た。ヤツは俺に大怪我を負わせ、牙狼法師は俺が生き残るのは無理だと言った…だが、俺はまだ死んではいない。あの戦いの後、2年間錯乱状態にあったがな」

languages.text: "Ein vollständiger Bericht all meiner Taten würde wie eine Lawine über Euch rollen." {n}Ulfar zeigt stolz auf ein Mal auf seiner Rüstung, das die Form gekreuzter Knochen hat.{/n} "Ich habe mir dieses Mal der Standhaftigkeit verdient, als ich den Häuptling eines Aeldari-Stamms getötet habe. Er hat mir eine schwere Wunde zugefügt, und der Wolfspriester sagte, ich würde sie nicht überleben ... doch noch hat sie mich nicht getötet. Nach dieser Schlacht lag ich zwei Jahre lang im Delirium."
languages.original_text: "A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew a chieftain of an Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

traits.locale_text: "Ein vollständiger Bericht all meiner Taten würde wie eine Lawine über Euch herrollen." {n}Ulfar zeigt stolz auf ein Mal auf seiner Rüstung, das die Form gekreuzter Knochen hat.{/n} "Ich habe mir dieses Mal der Standhaftigkeit verdient, als ich den Häuptling eines erbärmlichen Aeldari-Stamms getötet habe. Er hat mir eine schwere Wunde zugefügt, und der Wolfspriester sagte, ich würde sie nicht überleben ... Doch noch hat sie mich nicht getötet. Nach dieser Schlacht lag ich zwei Jahre lang im Delirium."

languages.text: « Le récit complet de tous mes exploits vous frapperait avec la force d'une avalanche. » {n}Avec une fierté assumée, Ulfar attire votre attention sur un symbole représentant des os croisés sur son armure.{/n} « J'ai gagné cette marque d'endurance lorsque j'ai abattu le chef d'une tribu aeldari. Il m'avait infligé une grave blessure, et le Prêtre Loup avait affirmé que je n'y survivrais pas... Pourtant, je suis toujours là. J'ai seulement passé les deux années qui ont suivi ce combat en plein délire. »
languages.original_text: "A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew the chieftain of an Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

traits.locale_text: « Le récit complet de tous mes exploits vous frapperait avec la force d'une avalanche. » {n}Avec une fierté assumée, Ulfar attire votre attention sur un symbole représentant des os croisés sur son armure.{/n} « J'ai gagné cette marque d'endurance lorsque j'ai abattu le chef d'une pathétique tribu d'Aeldaris. Il m'avait causé une grave blessure, et le prêtre-loup avait affirmé que je n'y survivrais pas... Mais je suis toujours là. J'ai seulement passé les deux années qui ont suivi ce combat en plein délire. »

languages.original_text: "A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew the chieftain of an Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

languages.text: "Kahramanlıklarımın hepsini anlatmaya kalksam üzerine bir çığ gibi devrilir." {n}Ulfar, zırhındaki çapraz kemikler şeklindeki nişanı gururla gösteriyor.{/n} "Bu dayanıklılık nişanını bir Aeldari kabilesinin şefini öldürdüğümde kazanmıştım mesela. Beni ağır yaralamıştı ve Kurt Rahibi sağ kalamayacağımı söylemişti ama hâlâ yaşıyorum. O savaştan sonra iki yıl hezeyan içinde kıvrandım."
languages.original_text: "A complete accounting of all my deeds would land like an avalanche upon you." {n}Ulfar proudly points out a marking on his armour in the form of crossed bones.{/n} "I earned this mark of endurance when I slew a chieftain of an Aeldari tribe. He dealt me a serious injury, and the Wolf Priest said I would not survive it... but it has not killed me yet. Two years I lay in a delirium after that battle."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatım boyunca yaptıklarımın değeri, senin üzerine bir çığ gibi yığılır." {n}Ulfar, zırhındaki çapraz kemikler şeklindeki nişanı gururla gösteriyor.{/n} "Bu sabır nişanını Aeldari kabilesinin şefini öldürdüğümde kazanmıştım. Beni ciddi bir şekilde yaralamıştı ve Kurt Rahibi sağ kalamayacağımı söylemişti ama hâlâ yaşıyorum. O savaştan sonra iki yıl hezeyan içinde kıvrandım."

"Hayatım boyunca yaptıklarımın değeri, senin üzerine bir çığ gibi yığılır." {n}Ulfar, zırhındaki çapraz kemikler şeklindeki nişanı gururla gösteriyor.{/n} "Bu sabır nişanını Aeldari kabilesinin şefini öldürdüğümde kazanmıştım. Beni ciddi bir şekilde yaralamıştı ve Kurt Rahibi sağ kalamayacağımı söylemişti ama hâlâ yaşıyorum. O savaştan sonra iki yıl hezeyan içinde kıvrandım."
